bibl.title: Prosopographia Ptolemaica. X. Foreign Ethnics in Hellenistic Egypt.
bibl.note: Part I: Certain Ethnics. - Part II: Uncertain and Fragmentary Ethnics. - Appendix I: Greek City-Ethnic Designations in Egypt. - Appendix II: Αἰγύπτιοι. - Index of Demotic and Hieroglyphic Ethnics. Bibliography.
bibl.seg: LA'DA Csaba A., Prosopographia Ptolemaica. X. Foreign Ethnics in Hellenistic Egypt. (Studia Hellenistica. 38.)
Leuven - Paris - Dudley, Mass., Peeters, 2002, 8°, xlvi-384 pp. ISBN 90-429-1195-6 (Peeters Leuven) / 2-87723-669-2 (Peeters France). €85.

Part I: Certain Ethnics. - Part II: Uncertain and Fragmentary Ethnics. - Appendix I: Greek City-Ethnic Designations in Egypt. - Appendix II: Αἰγύπτιοι. - Index of Demotic and Hieroglyphic Ethnics. Bibliography.

C.R. par Georges Nachtergael, ChrEg 79 (2004) Nos 157-158, pp. 358-359. - Günter Poethke, ArchPF 50 (2004) pp. 107-108. - Jan Krzysztof Winnicki, JJurP 33 (2003) pp. 369-372. - Orsolina Montevecchi (avec un addendum relatif aux Libyens par Gerardo Casanova), Aegyptus 83 (2003 [2006]) pp. 305-310.
